content: I am making a significant change to the IG Publisher: all the generated lists of resources (e.g. list-logicals.xhtml) have been generating using the [resource].name to display the link, not the [resource].title. I'm changing that
My list of operations is now blank - but I can't find a 'title' element in OperationDefinition.. (I have added in titles for all of my profiles and extensions and code systems)
oh. that doesn't have a title. weird
ok wait for buil 13786 to complete, and try again
Can you add a change proposal to add title to OperationDefinition - it ought to have one :)
Neither does SearchParam already submitted CR I think
